title: Samsung teases new material made from recycled fishing nets debuting alongside Galaxy S22
content:
Ahead of its Unpacked launch event later this week for the Galaxy S22 series, Samsung is teasing a new sustainability effort that integrates a new material into its products that is made from recycled fishing nets.

more…

The post Samsung teases new material made from recycled fishing nets debuting alongside Galaxy S22 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Set to debut alongside the Galaxy S22 series next week, Samsung is teasing a new plastic material made up of recycled fishing nets.
